Hafsat Abibakar Kari is a PhD student at University of Bradford, England, United Kingdom. She is currently researching on Circadian Rythms of naked Mole rats - an extraordinary long-lived mammalian model for studying aging and cancer. 

Her main scientific interests are in neuroendocrinology and reproductive biology. She is an alumnus of Bayero University Kano.
